data.name: Bomber Crew Secret Weapons DLC
data.detailed_description:
Are you ready for your most dangerous mission yet, where the enemy remains unseen to the radar, and is not like any enemy that you’ve fought before?


The Bomber Crew Secret Weapons DLC features an entirely new mini campaign, with all new Bomber upgrades, all new enemy Aces, and an all new mini-story which will defy all belief!


Take your crew on an expedition which will lead them through treacherous new weather conditions, fight against Aces with abilities that have never been seen before. Do you have what it takes to bring your Crew home, once more?

Features:
- New experimental enemy fighter craft!
- New enemy Aces
- A snow-swept environment featuring hazardous snowstorms
- New upgrades for your Bomber, such as the 20mm Cannon turret, Homing Missiles, and more!

data.short_description: Are you ready to face the enemy which cannot be seen? The enemy that haunts the skies with no trace? The Bomber Crew Secret Weapons DLC will take you on an adventure into the unknown, where the enemy may not be so obvious!
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Polish, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 x86/x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-530 (4 * 3000) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9800 GT (1024 MB)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 x86/x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6300 (2*3800) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 Ti (1024 MB)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: iMac 21' (Late 2013)
  • Processor: iMac 21' (Late 2013)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: iMac 27'' (Late 2015)
  • Processor: iMac 27'' (Late 2015)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or higher/Mint 18.1 x64
  • Processor: AMD Phenom 9850 (4 * 2500) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 4850 (1024 MB)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or higher/Mint 18.1 x64
  • Processor: AMD FX-8320 (8 * 3500) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 6970 (2048 MB)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
